      • Window

        public Window(Renderer renderer,
              java.lang.String title,
              int width,
              int height,
              boolean maximized,
              boolean resizable,
              boolean dontHaltThread)
        Create a window to render to
        Parameters:
        renderer - The renderer to use when rendering the window
        title - The title of the new window
        width - The width of the new window
        height - The height of the new window
        maximized - Weather the new window should be maxamized
        resizable - Weather the new window should be resizable
        dontHaltThread - Weather to not halt the current thread until the window has been initialized (Note if you set this to true you must wait until the window has been initialized to use it)
        Since:
        1.7.0
